All Classes

  • Class Description
    Action
    Represents a complete action that a player can perform in his turn.
    ActionSelectedEvent
    Event from clients, represents the selection of an Action
    AlreadyLoggedException
    The user with the specified name is already logged in the current game
    AmmoButton
    It's represent an ammo on the board
    AmmoColor
    Colors of ammos and squares.
    AmmoSquare
    Extends square and represents those square which contain ammoTiles (opposite to spawn points)
    AmmoTile
    Represents the ammo tile: those tiles placed on the map, containg some ammos (up to 3) and an optional powerUp
    ApplyEffectImmediatelyException
    The effect does not require any user interaction, so has to be applied immediately
    ArgumentNavigator
    util to get arguments from commandline.
    Backup
    It contains information in order to make a rollback during a match or to resume a match from file
    BackupTest  
    BoardGui
    It's the board of the game, the player can effectively play the game with
    Border
    Possible types for the border of a square
    Cash
    Represents the equivalent of money and costs in adrenaline: a triple of blue, red and yellow ammos.
    CashTest  
    Cli
    The command line user interface
    Cli.CliState
    the possible states in which the cli can be
    Client
    The central node of the client, connects the user interface, the network interface and the small match representation It is responsible of taking updates from the server, updating the small match, presenting to the user the match status taking user's choices and sending them to the server
    ClientMain
    Start client, reading arguments from command line or using default
    ClientMain.ClientConfig
    Represents client configuration
    ClientParser  
    CliUtils
    a class of useful method for cli
    ColorSelectedEvent
    Event from clients, represents the selection of a Color
    Command
    Possible command for the user to choose
    CommandSelectedEvent
    Event from clients, represents the selection of a Command
    CommonProperties
    Contains values for ping pong between client and server
    ConnectionInitializationException
    The connection to the server cannot be established
    ConnectionUpdateMessage
    Represents the update of players' connections
    Controller  
    CurrentPlayerUpdateMessage
    Represents current player's update
    DamageTrack
    It represents a player's damageTrack
    DamageTrack
    Is (part of) the of each player, it contains the damages and marks received.
    DamageUpdateMessage
    Represents the update of a player's DamageTrack
    DecksView
    Represents the decks on client, in order to properly load description in user interface
    Direction
    Cardinal directions on the map
    Effect  
    EffectTest  
    EventVisitable
    Represents interface for event from clients
    EventVisitor
    Represents interface for the EventVisitor, who matches, dinamically, Events with their proper method on server
    ForwardingException
    An event cannot be sent to the server
    FrenzyDamageTrack
    Is (part of) the board of a player when he is in frenzy mode.
    FrenzyDamageTrackTest  
    GameFullException
    A match is in progress and no user can log
    GameModel
    Is the center of the game, which embeds most of the game rules.
    GameModelTest  
    GameOverException
    The action triggered the end of the game
    GameOverGui
    Window showed when a GameOverMessage is received, showing each player whit his final position and points
    GameOverMessage
    Represents the message of game over
    GeneralInfoBox
    Contains the title of the playing window
    GenericMessage
    Represents a generic message
    Grab
    Represents the task of grabbing, which involves movement to a certain square.
    Gui
    This Class starts GUI main, creating a window in which to choose network technology
    InputTimer
    TimerTask that forces player disconnection, performed when an InputTimer is over
    KillShotTrack
    Is the part of board that keeps track of kills and remaining skulls.
    KillShotTrackBox
    Contains the killshot track of the match
    KillShotTrackTest  
    KillshotTrackUpdateMessage
    Represents the update of the killshot track
    Layout
    This class represents the layout (intended as map) of the game
    LayoutBox
    Contains the map of the match (with ammoTiles in squares)
    LayoutTest  
    LayoutUpdateMessage
    Represents the update of the layout
    LayoutView
    Represents Layout on client, in order to properly load it in user interface
    LoginEvent
    Event from clients, represents the chosen name for the match
    LoginGui
    It's the login window of the GUI, in which choose own nickname
    LoginMessage
    Represents login response to a LoginEvent
    LoginTimer
    TimerTask that check is match can starts, performed when a LoginTimer is over
    Match
    Represents a specific match.
    MatchTest  
    MatchView
    Represents Match on client
    MessageVisitable
    Represents interface for messages from server
    MessageVisitor
    Represent interface for MessageVisitor, who matches, dinamically, Messages with their proper method on client
    MicroAction
    Represents the elementary tasks that compose a complete action.
    MiniBox
    Is the elementary component of a window, a rectangular matrix of Strings
    Mode
    Represents a mode of a weapon.
    ModeChoiceScreen
    It represents the screen in which to choose the mode of a weapon
    ModeSelectedEvent
    Event from clients, represents the selection of a Mode
    ModeView
    Represents Mode of weapons on client
    Move
    Represents the task of moving to a certain square.
    MyInfoBox
    Contains the information about the player of this client
    MyPlayer
    Represents the Player of this client
    MyPowerUpBox
    Contains the powerUps of my player
    MyWeaponBox
    Contains the weapons of my player
    NameAlreadyTakenException
    The name chosen is already taken by someone else
    NameEmptyException
    The chosen name is empty
    NameNotFoundException
    A match is in progress and the specified player is not present
    NetworkInterfaceClient
    It is the interface of network from client's point of view, permits to send events to server.
    NetworkInterfaceServer  
    NextMicroActionException
    The microAction does not require any usr interaction, so the next one has to be launched
    NormalDamageTrack
    Is (part of) the board of a player when he is in frenzy mode.
    NormalDamageTrackTest  
    NoSuchObserverException
    There is no such observer currently registered
    Observable
    Observable interface for observer pattern
    Observer
    Observer interface for observer pattern
    Parser
    It's represent the parser who loads graphics resources
    ParserManager
    Parser to load server configuration
    PaymentUpdateMessage
    Represents payment update
    PixelPosition
    It represent the translation for: AmmoButton, PlayerRectangle, SquareRectangle, associated to a square, on the board
    PixelWeapon
    It represent the translation and rotation ratio for a weapon
    Player
    A class representing a Player of the game.
    PlayerBox
    Contains information, damages and marks of a player
    PlayerColor
    Possible colors of players
    PlayerRectangle
    It represent a player on the board as a rectangle
    PlayerSelectedEvent
    Event from clients, represents the selection of a Player
    PlayerState
    Possible states of a player.
    PlayerTest  
    PlayerUpdateMessage
    Represents a player's update
    PlayerView
    Represents Player on client
    PlayingWindow
    Is the (virtual) window of the game
    PowerUp
    Is the powerUp card, which contains a list of effects.
    PowerUpButton
    It represents a power up card
    PowerUpSelectedEvent
    Event from clients, represents the selection of a PowerUp
    PowerUpTest  
    PowerUpType
    Different types of powerups.
    PowerUpUpdateMessage
    Represents a player's power ups update
    PowerUpView
    Represents PowerUp on client
    ReceiveTagback
    Represents the task of receiving a tagback grenade.
    Reload
    Represents the task of reloading a weapon
    RmiClient  
    RmiServer  
    RmiServerAcceptor  
    RmiServerAcceptorInterface  
    RmiServerRemoteInterface  
    Room  
    SelectablesBox
    The MiniBox containing the choices available for the user
    SelectablesUpdateMessage
    Represents the player's update of selectables weapons, squares, modes, commands, action, colors, players and power ups
    ServerMain  
    ServerMain.ServerConfig  
    ServerView
    VirtualView, observer of model, used to send updates to client
    Shoot
    Represents is the task of shooting with a weapon
    SocketClient  
    SocketServer  
    SpawnSquare
    Extends square and represents the spawn points, which also contains weapons to collect
    Square
    Is the abstract class of squares, which completely describes it as object of the map.
    SquareRectangle
    It represents a square of the board as a rectangle
    SquareSelectedEvent
    Event from clients, represents the selection of a Square
    SquareTest  
    SquareView
    Represents a Square on client
    StackManager
    Represents a common point of access to all the decks of the game, that allows drawing and discarding of all the cards.
    StackManagerTest  
    StartMatchUpdateMessage
    Represents the update the match starts with
    testUtils  
    TitleAndListWindow
    Generic window to display a list of things to the user
    TitleAndTextWindow
    Generic window to display a text to the user
    UseActionPowerUp
    Represents the task of using a powerup of the type ACTION_POWER_UP (teleporter and newton).
    UserInterface
    Implemented by Cli and Gui, makes them update
    UseTargeting
    Represents the task of using the targeeting scope powerup
    Weapon
    Is teh weapon object, it is made out of modes which contains elementary effects.
    WeaponButton
    It represent a weapon
    WeaponSelectedEvent
    Event from clients, represents the selection of a Weapon
    WeaponsInLayoutBox
    the MiniBox containing the weapons in a spawn point
    WeaponsUpdateMessage
    Represents a player's weapons update
    WeaponTest  
    WeaponView
    Represents a weapon on client
    Window
    Virtual window containing some content to display on the terminal
    WrongSelectionException
    The selection made by the user cannot be done at the moment or contains an error
